humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, there are positive lymph nodes found in the right axillary sentinel node biopsies (1/1) for sentinel nodes 1, 2, and 3. Additionally, there are no metastatic carcinomas found in the nonsentinel lymph node biopsy (0/2). The axillary dissection also shows that 19 lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma (0/19). Therefore, based on the rules provided, the patient's N stage is N1, as there are metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The N stage for this patient is N1 because there is metastatic carcinoma found in 1 out of the 3 sentinel lymph nodes (1/1, 1/1, 0/1) and no metastatic carcinoma found in the 19 nonsentinel lymph nodes (0/19). This is consistent with the pathologic stage pN1 in the report.
